title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Recommendation System-Based e-Learning Design Capability Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can effectively analyze 70% or more of existing learning design cases using a recommendation system.
Learners can design and revise language education activity sequences three or more times in a VR-based simulation environment.
Learners can improve their instructional design plans by 20% or more by incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
